summary: Adds 3 standalone female followers: Moretz, Daira, Lewina
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]Sorry, English is not my native Language. So I don't understand well the meaning of comments. :'(

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59970-1-1416043183.jpg[/img]

Feature:
-Adds 3 female followers.
-This is a Standalone mod.

Follower Info:
-Location: 'Dragonsreach' in Whiterun
-Essential, Marriage possible

<Moretz>
-Race: Breton
-Body : CBBE
-CombatStyle : Onehanded Sword + Shield

<Daira>
-Race: Nord
-Body : UNP
-CombatStyle : Shock Magic + Summoner

<Lewina>
-Race: Wood Elf
-Body : UNP
-CombatStyle : StarShot Magic

[youtube]rnkCmkmRKos[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url]. Thank you! :D

Recommended mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light[/url] by tktk1
